description.narrative: The Project would have a strong development impact as follows: 1) Increase access to finance for underserved population in Tajikistan, contributing to employment generation, economic growth, and poverty reduction; and 2) Build market confidence for other investors to invest in Tajikistan on a long-term basis.

The proposed project will be IFCs third loan to Closed Stock Company Microcredit Deposit Organization ''''IMON International'''' (IMON), currently Tajikistans largest microfinance company, which was founded in 2005. The proposed project is to provide a senior loan to IMON, which would use the loan to expand lending to micro and small entrepreneurs. The Company seeks long-term funding to continue its dynamic growth and offer new products to its target clientele. This Project supports a strong financial intermediary with a successful track record of providing funding to local micro entrepreneurs.

participating-org.narrative: CJSC MICROCREDIT DEPOSIT TAKING ORGANIZATION IMON INTERNATIONAL

mailing-address.narrative: CSC MDO IMON INTERNATIONAL 17th microdistrict, house 2Khujand, Tajikistan, 735700 Attention: Sanavbar Sharipova, General Director. Facsimile No.: 992 3422 25744 Telephone No.: 992 3422 42353 http://www.imon.tj

name.narrative: IMON is headquartered in Khujand, Tajikistan and is currently present in most of the regions of Tajikistan and runs a network of 17 branches and 117 offices. The proposed projects proceeds will be used for financing all eligible projects across IMONs network.
